author: whazz
title: Social Mobile Game powered by CNFTs
description: Simple but important low hanging fruits use cases are underused to expose gamers to the ecosystem. Particularly mobile and social games.
solution: Build a compelling mobile game that brings gamers to the ecosystem. Use Twitter integration for the social element and exposure.
experience:
Existing team with established CNFT project and social media presence  
Including senior devs, talented artist and quality assurance role.
